Shockwave/Firestarter/Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Vehement/Sun 
Crusher/Reflector/ Sixshot/Ares/Unicron/Teufel:



Shockwave sat in the meeting room of the Ramora where all main members of the 
Empire would meet and discuss things in the future, and across from him was 
Firestarter.

Both working vigorously on plans to rebuild their headquarters into a 
stronger and more deadly ship.

---

Double Punch, Manterror, and Injector rested in the repair bay as numerous 
mechanical arms worked repairs, such as welding gashes shut and reattaching 
newly built arms to replace to badly destroyed ones.

It would take several more mega-cycles before the repairs would be complete.

---

Sun Crusher and Reflector skirmished against each other in the Ramora's 
holo-decks, each having several dozen hologram warriors and fighting in a 
"battle" in present Iacon.

---

While busy partrolling the area in a one klick radius of the Ramora, Sixshot 
and Ares struck up a conversation.

"We bail them out of their scrape with heavy firepower, and they reward us 
with perimeter guard duty?"

"Well, Ares, we'd be dead if they hadn't put our minds in replicas of our old 
bodies."

"I suppose..."

"So be quiet, we're even.  Next battle we'll prove ourselves more than equal 
to anyone in this NDE."

===

Unicron looked to Vehement and Teufel.  The entire team made up of the 
Brotherhood were heading for Rapa Nui swiftly via air.

"What next, mighty one?" Vehement asked.

"We shall return to the Sanctuary and watch this pitiful world and then 
decide to act.  Until that time, I shall continue my work with Teufel and you 
will continue learening the workings of my stronghold's systems.

"Understood."
